info.title: BlockchainManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure Blockchain Service

get.description: Lists the available operations of Microsoft.Blockchain resource provider.
Lists the blockchain members for a subscription.

keyName.description: Gets or sets the API key name.

value.description: Gets or sets the API key value.

ApiKey.description: API key payload which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

keys.description: Gets or sets the collection of API key.

ApiKeyCollection.description: Collection of the API key payload which is exposed in the response of the resource provider.

BlockchainMember.description: Payload of the blockchain member which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL, that the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of blockchain members.

BlockchainMemberCollection.description: Collection of the blockchain member payload which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

capacity.description: Gets or sets the nodes capacity.

BlockchainMemberNodesSku.description: Payload of the blockchain member nodes Sku for a blockchain member.

consortium.description: Gets or sets the consortium for the blockchain member.

consortiumManagementAccountAddress.description: Gets the managed consortium management account address.

consortiumManagementAccountPassword.description: Sets the managed consortium management account password.

consortiumMemberDisplayName.description: Gets the display name of the member in the consortium.

consortiumRole.description: Gets the role of the member in the consortium.

dns.description: Gets the dns endpoint of the blockchain member.

password.description: Sets the basic auth password of the blockchain member.

protocol.description: Gets or sets the blockchain protocol.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member provision state.

publicKey.description: Gets the public key of the blockchain member (default transaction node).

rootContractAddress.description: Gets the Ethereum root contract address of the blockchain.

userName.description: Gets the auth user name of the blockchain member.

BlockchainMemberProperties.description: Payload of the blockchain member properties for a blockchain member.

consortiumManagementAccountPassword.description: Sets the managed consortium management account password.

BlockchainMemberPropertiesUpdate.description: Update the payload of the blockchain member properties for a blockchain member.

tags.description: Tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describes the resource.

BlockchainMemberUpdate.description: Update the payload of the blockchain member which is exposed in the request/response of the resource provider.

name.description: Gets or sets the blockchain member name.

protocol.description: Gets or sets the protocol for the consortium.

value.description: Gets or sets the collection of consortiums.

dateModified.description: Gets the consortium member modified date.

subscriptionId.description: Gets the consortium member subscription id.
